DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to screen the effective core formulation in insomnia treatment with Chinese medicine with a double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled trial.
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Study of Effective Core Formula of Chinese Medicine to Treat Primary Insomnia
DOC.criteria: aged between 18 and 65 years, meeting the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, 5th Edition (DSMV) of insomnia, Spiegel scale score is ≥ 18, The informed consent must be obtained from patient total sleep time ≤ 2 hours, secondary insomnia, Selfrating Anxiety Scale (SAS) score ≥ 18, Beck Depression Inventory (BDI) score ≥ 6, having hypertension, diabetes, stroke, and coronary heart disease, have drug abuse history, pregnancy or preparing to pregnancy, used immunotherapy or hormone therapy in past 1 years, participating in another clinical trial.
